title: Knife, "Silhouette Viande", ca. 1930
markings: On blade, stamped: "INSICO/ STAINLESS." On handle, stamped: "1847 ROGERS BROS."
creditline: Museum purchase from Decorative Arts Association Acquisition Fund
description: Small blade attached to elongated oval handle with molded pattern of four overlapping panels interlocked at handle.

tombstone.epitaph:
Knife, "Silhouette Viande", ca. 1930.
ca. 1930. silver plate. Museum purchase from Decorative Arts Association Acquisition Fund. 1993-150-8.
